required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Two Combinations in Antiretroviral Post-Exposure Prophylaxis for HIV-1: Tenofovir/Emtricitabine (Truvada ®) + Lopinavir/Ritonavir (Kaletra ®) vs Tenofovir/Emtricitabine/Cobicistat/Elvitegravir (Stribild ®). Prospective, Randomized, Open.
clinical_study.official_title: Prophylaxis for HIV-1: Tenofovir/Emtricitabine (Truvada ®) + Lopinavir/Ritonavir (Kaletra ®) vs Tenofovir/Emtricitabine/Cobicistat/Elvitegravir (Stribild ®). Prospective, Randomized, Open.

lead_sponsor.agency: Fundacion Clinic per a la Recerca Biomédica

clinical_study.source: Fundacion Clinic per a la Recerca Biomédica

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to compare the tolerability and adherence to a new drug regimen of post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) for HIV,

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients who leave the initial treatment of post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) for HIV for any reason
primary_outcome.description: A subject is considered to abandon treatment if within 28 days dies Do not come to visit week 4 changed or discontinued study treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of clinical adverse events and / or laboratory alterations.
Proportion of patients who discontinued treatment due to toxicity or intolerance in each of the treatment arms at 24 weeks follow-up
degree of adhesion during the treatment period
secondary_outcome.description: Measured by pill count and patient adherence questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: time to loss of adherence to TARV
Proportion of patients with seroconversion in both treatment arms at 24 weeks follow-up.

intervention.description: (TRUVADA) film-coated 200/245 mg tablet / day tablets (Kaletra) film-coated 200/50 mg tablets twice / day tablets
Film-coated tablets of 150 mg of elvitegravir, cobicistat 150 mg, 200 mg of emtricitabine and 245 mg of tenofovir disoproxil. One tablet once / day.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age greater than 18 years
- Have been exposed to HIV, non-occupational and meets the requirements of current recommendations to start with three antiretroviral drugs PEP
- that adequately informed consent in writing to participate in the study and undergo testing and exploration that entails
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnant women, lactating, or those intend become pregnant during the study period.
- subjects who are known or suspected case presents the source resistors to one of the drugs of the pattern of study
- contraindicated treatment with the study drugs, or products under investigation

overall_official.affiliation: Hospital clínic y provincial de Barcelona

facility.name: Hospital clínico y provincial de Barcelona

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Fundacion Clinic per a la Recerca Biomédica

intervention_browse.mesh_term: Emtricitabine, Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate Drug Combination
Elvitegravir, Cobicistat, Emtricitabine, Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate Drug Combination
